Description: Display and rotate the root CA

data.--ca-cert pem-file: Path to the PEM-formatted root CA certificate to use for the new cluster
data.--ca-key pem-file: Path to the PEM-formatted root CA key to use for the new cluster
data.-d, --detach: Exit immediately instead of waiting for the root rotation to converge
data.--external-ca external-ca: Specifications of one or more certificate signing endpoints
data.--rotate: Rotate the swarm CA - if no certificate or key are provided, new ones will be generated
